ygData.subject: Re: HALO and EYE are BOTH conjuation
ygData.msgSnippet: I raised my Conjuration when casting Halo . ..  went from 2 to 3 the other DAY lol we are not conjurures hehe so I am not sure where you are getting this whole
ygData.messageBody:
I raised my Conjuration when casting Halo . .. went from 2 to 3 the other
DAY lol we are not conjurures hehe

so I am not sure where you are getting this whole div thing . . .
